I'm refining the categorization of the IT ticket, with a strong leaning towards "Access" due to recurring mentions of mailboxes, Active Directory rights, and profile management within the "leaver service" context. While storage and hardware are briefly touched upon, the dominant theme points towards managing user access as part of the departure process.
